database.name: mysql
database.recordCountQuery: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {{TABLE_NAME}} WHERE timestamp >= ? AND timestamp < ?
database.recordDeletionQuery: DELETE FROM {{TABLE_NAME}} WHERE timestamp >= ? AND timestamp < ?
database.recordMergeQuery: INSERT INTO {{TABLE_NAME}} (partition_key, timestamp, data, record_id) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE partition_key=VALUES(partition_key), timestamp=VALUES(timestamp), data=VALUES(data)
database.recordRetrievalQuery: SELECT record_id, timestamp, data FROM {{TABLE_NAME}} WHERE partition_key >= ? and partition_key < ? AND timestamp >= ? AND timestamp < ? LIMIT ?,?
database.recordRetrievalWithIdsQuery: SELECT record_id, timestamp, data FROM {{TABLE_NAME}} WHERE record_id IN ({{RECORD_IDS}})

recordTableInitQueries.query: CREATE TABLE {{TABLE_NAME}} (record_id VARCHAR(50), timestamp BIGINT, data LONGBLOB, partition_key INT, PRIMARY KEY(record_id)) ENGINE='MyISAM'

database.fsUpdateDataPathQuery: UPDATE AN_FS_DATA SET path = ? WHERE path = ?
database.fsFileLengthRetrievalQuery: SELECT length FROM AN_FS_PATH WHERE path = ?
database.fsListFilesQuery: SELECT path FROM AN_FS_PATH WHERE parent_path = ?
database.fsReadDataChunkQuery: SELECT data FROM AN_FS_DATA WHERE path = ? AND sequence = ?
database.fsSetFileLengthQuery: UPDATE AN_FS_PATH SET length = ? WHERE path = ?

fsTableInitQueries.query: CREATE TABLE AN_FS_PATH (path VARCHAR(256), is_directory BOOLEAN, length BIGINT, parent_path VARCHAR(256), PRIMARY KEY(path)) ENGINE='MyISAM'
CREATE TABLE AN_FS_DATA (path VARCHAR(256), sequence BIGINT, data LONGBLOB, PRIMARY KEY (path,sequence)) ENGINE='MyISAM'

database.fsTablesCheckQuery: SELECT path FROM AN_FS_PATH WHERE path = '/'
database.fsMergeDataChunkQuery: INSERT INTO AN_FS_DATA (path,sequence,data) VALUES (?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE data=VALUES(data)
